alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 2:18PM PST until February 14 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR PYRAMID LAKE... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet with highest waves from mid lake to north and east shores. * WHERE...Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will switch to north early Tuesday morning with lake chop possibly a concern for small watercraft through the day Tuesday.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
